0.3.name: wordpress/rdface
0.3.description: RDFa Content Editor (RDFaCE) is a plugin for TinyMCE rich text editor. RDFaCE is an implementation for WYSIWYM (What You See Is What You Mean) concept. It enables end-users to easily annotate their blog posts using RDFa and Microdata markups. This special edition focuses on Schema.org schemas. For more info visit RDFaCE project page at http://rdface.aksw.org/ or watch the WYSIWYM concept video at http://youtu.be/wxtlAol4HB0
